snippet.title: BUBBLE BUSTER (ZX SPECTRUM - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Bubble Buster (un-emulated) for the zx spectrum, a true classic from the golden era of spectrum gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1983

So, many of you Pang and Ooops up fans thought that those games were original eh?! Well this is one example that proves they weren't, this game was released back in 1983 and as you can see it is exactly the same style of game of those two games.
Blow all the bubbles to pieces, but be careful as they get smaller with every hit and can be tricky to avoid being hit.
The game is remarkably fast especially for a 1983 speccy game, on the later levels it's pretty impossible as it can get ridiculously fast and insane with so many fast bouncing balls flying around the place,...check it out at 7:55!
The game repeats the last level "round C" until you die.
I have used the invincibility poke so I could upload the entire game for your viewing pleasure.

Hope all you Spectrum fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Spectrum and it's cool games alive!!!
